title: Add "start" like the one from cmd.exe
body: So you know how you can run "start myprogram" in the regular cmd.exe? Something like that for text based applications running in WSL. So if I wanted to download packages in a seperate window, I could run something like "start sudo apt get upgrade" straight from WSL. Also, an option to auto-terminate the window would be great.

comments.body: In the mean time I would suggest trying a WSL-compatible terminal with hotkeys to open new windows.
